item.description:
Alastair and Pat Proulx-Lough will
briefly review the challenges of
Peak Oil and Climate Change, and
then present an introduction to
the Transition Town concept,
which allows people in start
tackling these complex issues in
their own community.

The progress of the several Transition Towns in the UK and US will be presented. A short video of Rob Hopkins' presentation on Transition Towns to the International Forum on Globalization in 2007 will be shown, if people are not familiar with it. (It can be accessed on meetup introductory page.)

A general discussion will follow, looking at how the process might proceed in Portland, and other areas of Maine.
item.how_to_find_us: We will arrive at 6:30 pm and be talking with people near the front.
item.name: From Oil Dependency....to Local Resilience
